EmailTemplate.name: E&F Billing Agreement Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: Billing Agreement changes rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!User.FirstName},
your changes for an Airline Billing Agreement between {!EF_Billing_Agreement__c.Client__r.Name} and {!EF_Billing_Agreement__c.Airline__r.Name} have been rejected. Please visit the Approval History section on the record for manager's comments.
